item.title: By: aadila
item.dc:creator: aadila
item.description: I made the Quiche today,substituting sausages for the bacon. The result was fantastic!
item.content:encoded: I made the Quiche today,substituting sausages for the bacon. The result was fantastic!

item.title: By: Steph
item.dc:creator: Steph
item.description: Ooh that pastry looks so crispy, and I like how you have the alternative with the pumpkin! Looks delicious :)
item.content:encoded: Ooh that pastry looks so crispy, and I like how you have the alternative with the pumpkin! Looks delicious ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Parita
item.dc:creator: Parita
item.description: Wow the quiche looks so tempting..perfect

item.title: By: Lorraine @ Not Quite Nigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @ Not Quite Nigella
item.description: YAY so glad that you liked it-isn't the crust the best? Your quiche looks lovely and I often sub ingredients for this and it always seems to work! :)
item.content:encoded: YAY so glad that you liked it-isn’t the crust the best? Your quiche looks lovely and I often sub ingredients for this and it always seems to work! ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: oh yum, this quiche looks so fluffy and cheesy. I LOVe quiche, regardless of its eggy-ness. I've never had one with capsicum before though, this does sound interesting
item.content:encoded: oh yum, this quiche looks so fluffy and cheesy. I LOVe quiche, regardless of its eggy-ness. I’ve never had one with capsicum before though, this does sound interesting

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: This looks lovely. I'd be hard put to choose between bacon and pumpkin, but pumpkins are so sweet at the moment I think it would win. Poor Nick grating the butter - he must be very glad you bought a food processor! I haven't seen a cream cheese pastry before. Can you taste it?
item.content:encoded: This looks lovely. I’d be hard put to choose between bacon and pumpkin, but pumpkins are so sweet at the moment I think it would win. Poor Nick grating the butter – he must be very glad you bought a food processor! I haven’t seen a cream cheese pastry before. Can you taste it?
